items.raw_string: Name of donor: Results UKAddress of donor: 31-33 Bondway, London SW8 1SJAmount of donation (or estimate of the probable value): flights £741; 3 nights' accommodation in Kampala £450; 1 night's accommodation in Masaka £21; food and drink £122; internal transport £43; total £1,377Destination of visit: Kampala and Masaka, UgandaDate of visit: 21-25 August 2016Purpose of visit: Delegation to gain insight into the impact of UK support to Uganda to improve child health outcomes through DFID’s bilateral programmes and support to multilateral organisations.(20 September 2016; updated 22 September 2016)
